translations.text: By those ˹angels˺ stripping out ˹evil souls˺ harshly,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and those pulling out ˹good souls˺ gently,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translation.text: And those who race each other

translations.text: and those taking the lead vigorously,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹Consider˺ the Day ˹when˺ the quaking Blast will come to pass,<sup foot_note=77585>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹The deniers’˺ hearts on that Day will be trembling ˹in horror˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹But now˺ they ask ˹mockingly˺, “Will we really be restored to our former state,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: even after we have been reduced to decayed bones?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Adding, “Then such a return would be a ˹total˺ loss ˹for us˺!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But indeed, it will take only one ˹mighty˺ Blast,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and at once they will be above ground.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Has the story of Moses reached you ˹O Prophet˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

translations.text: His Lord called him in the sacred valley of Ṭuwa,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹commanding,˺ “Go to Pharaoh, for he has truly transgressed ˹all bounds˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

translations.text: And say, ‘Would you ˹be willing to˺ purify yourself,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqul hal laka ila an tazakka
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and let me guide you to your Lord so that you will be in awe ˹of Him˺?’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Then Moses showed him the great sign,<sup foot_note=77586>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then turned his back, striving ˹against the truth˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Then he summoned ˹his people˺ and called out,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: saying, “I am your lord, the most high!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So Allah overtook him, making him an example in this life and the next.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ

translations.text: Surely in this is a lesson for whoever stands in awe of ˹Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ ۚ بَنَىٰهَا

translations.text: Which is harder to create: you or the sky?<sup foot_note=77587>1</sup> He built it,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: raising it high and forming it flawlessly.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: He dimmed its night, and brought forth its daylight.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: As for the earth, He spread it out as well,<sup foot_note=77588>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: bringing forth its water and pastures
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and setting the mountains firmly ˹upon it˺—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But, when the Supreme Disaster<sup foot_note=77589>1</sup> comes to pass—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: the Day every person will remember all ˹their˺ striving,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the Hellfire will be displayed for all to see—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then as for those who transgressed
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and preferred the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: the Hellfire will certainly be ˹their˺ home.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ

translations.text: And as for those who were in awe of standing before their Lord and restrained themselves from ˹evil˺ desires,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waama man khafa maqamarabbihi wanaha annafsa AAani alhawa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ regarding the Hour, “When will it be?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But it is not for you to tell its time.<sup foot_note=77590>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: That knowledge rests with your Lord ˹alone˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Your duty is only to warn whoever is in awe of it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا

translations.text: On the Day they see it, it will be as if they had stayed ˹in the world˺ no more than one evening or its morning.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaannahum yawma yarawnaha lamyalbathoo illa AAashiyyatan aw duhaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
